article: A hot dog is one of the most popular American food. It was named after frankfurter, a German food. You may hear "hot dog"  _  in other ways. People sometimes  _  "hot dog" to express pleasure . For example, a friend may ask if you would like to go to the cinema. You  might  say, "Great. I'd love to. " Or, you could say"  Hot dog  ! I'd love to go." People  _  use the expression to describe someone who is a "show-off", who tries to show everyone else how  _  he is. You often hear such a(n)  _  called a "hot dog". He may be a basketball player, for example, who  _  the ball with one hand making a(n)  _  catch seem more difficult. You know he is a "hot dog" because when he makes such a catch, he bows to crowd, hoping to  _  their cheers.
